name: momosdiary
description:
a dollie trapped in hopelessness

momo is a supercute doll with a lot of friends who love her dearly...watch as she sinks through the depths of hell!

this is a game very personal 2 me..things that have happened,feelings,etc;

if yu like it/it relates to you i wrote more abt the game and other personal feeling here https://softservetreatz.substack.com/p/momos-diary-postmortem

readtime ~30min, headphones recommend🎧🎵

thank u if you read!!!
